channel.title: How To Protect RSCD v25 Against Usd Database Hacker?
channel.description:
Help please, I tryed alot of this.... he Just keeps hacking and Making itself 123, banning people ect ;\
Its a 7 Year old Kid ffs... How can i defend... I dont ahve 123 Files, No backups... how can he find my passw all time :S

item.title: How To Protect RSCD v25 Against Usd Database Hacker?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“meatstick, post:9, topic:238276”][quote author=EndlessLife link=topic=314516.msg2501494#msg2501494 date=1224699938]
Xent, But other peeps say Usd is somebody else…
[/quote]
usd = Lefty ( I think )
Here is what you can do, if usd wasn’t on a proxy while he registered, send a message to his ISP saying he is doing illegal things. Such as child porno(very good suggestion) =)[/quote]

Lmao, no offence but that is the dumbest shit I have ever heard off. Do you actually think that shit like that will work? Please give me a break; !!!

On topic - endless, i got you pm on msn, unfortunetly yur not on at the time am on. =/

item.description:
@adu wrote:

  1. Do you have a password on you databse?

  2. Is your website make the default user admin?

If the answer is no to both those questing. Contact me on msn

The hacker is probally not doing it via databse.
